group.name: script
group.module: require/js/module path to load widget class. Will load, then continue with class attribute
group.class: $[class] referenceable, loaded widget class. Optional if module attribute or script element provided

Attributes.src: path/to/source.html to load. Optional if html element is provided.

elements.script: code that will be executed after module & class attributes
elements.html: html to load for the element. Optional if src attributes is provided
elements.data: View state/options< Base64 block data xml key/value pairs json /data>
